root.name: Lair of the Evildoer
root.description: OverviewLair of the Evildoer is an Action/RPG game developed and published by Going Loud Studios for Xbox Live Indie Games.PC System RequirementsSystem: Windows XP/Vista/7Processor: 1.5 GhzMemory: 512Video Card: 16 MB, DirectX 9.0Sound card: compatible with DirectX 9.0Hard Disk: 30 MB
